overview: 2020, the whole world is subject to dictatorship. Paris and all the capitals of the world are under the influence of a former army general who colonized all continents to seize power. Its only purpose: to destroy the planet and humanity. For this, it forces the greatest scientists to develop destructive substances. Under the effect of one of these gases, the world has lost its colors, people do not see any more than in black and white, they can not sleep anymore - there is no more night - only days trying to live and find sleep. But this is only the beginning.
title: La dernière nuit
